ygData.subject: Footloose and fancy free...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ve been on a big armor-upgrade kick lately, when it occurred to me that I am still walking around in the same ol footwear that I ve had since... well,
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I've been on a big armor-upgrade kick lately, when it
occurred to me that I am still walking around in the same ol' footwear that
I've had since... well, forever. It's like walking around in the beat up
blue Keds you had back in 2nd grade. Seeing as there is no 'mesh boots' or
anything of that ilk, I was wondering what was out there that was
monk-friendly (i.e. low weight). AC is obviouly desireable, although
anything that could offer other bonuses (stat increase, resistances, etc.)
would be wonderful.
Suggestions, advices, personal experiences appreciated...

--
Aaron Braunstein
Pacific Data Management, Inc.

<aaron_braunstein@...>
